description.@en: You are instantly immolated in holy light, rejecting all that is wrong and chaotic in this world.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, you are instantly immolated in a harmless, white blinding light. Providing they are considered to be a heretic or a Mutant creature, those within the Explosion Template centered on you suffer [[/roll 2D10]]+[WB] in Damage. This ignores any Damage Threshold Modifier their armor may confer.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but those so affected are also set On Fire.

criticalFailure.@en: The flames of your inner passion fizzles out. So distraught are you that you suffer a -30 Base Chance to all Skill Tests for a number of minutes equal to your [WB].

reagents.@en: A golden amulet inscribed with the holy symbol of your god
